name: Hit Block
description:
Hit Block is a brick breaker and breakout style game, but replaces the rectangle in the base by a circular character and replaces the simple colors blocks by beautiful characters. Control the ball, destroy the blocks and don't drop the ball in this arcade style game.

Features:

You can play any of the 9 worlds in any order.

Play with a volleyball (a yellow and blue ball or a pink ball) or a soccer ball.

You start with 3 extra balls.

Some enemies try to shoot you.

The blocks can be fruits, animals, plants, flowers, dragons shooting fire, samurais and even ninjas that shoot shuriken.

Featuring animals like monkey, cat, penguin, chicken, walrus, pig and even bees.
